raw_text: SWARNA WIJETUNGE (Emeritus Professor of Education Psychology,​ University of Colombo). Beloved wife of G.A. Wijetunge,​ loving mother of Vipuli and Anju,​ mother-in-law of Kishan Amarasekera and Avantha Tennakoon,​ much loved grandmother of Bodhi,​ Anik and Anissa,​ (All of USA),​ passed away on 15th of October and was cremated on 18th of October at the Donaldson Funeral Home Crematorium,​ Maryland,​ USA.067985
